クラス Combinatorics

extends java.lang.Object

メソッドの詳細

permutation

public static long permutation(int n,
                               int r)
calculate permutation ... nPr = n! / (n - r)!

パラメータ:
n - number of all elements
r - number of selected elements
戻り値:
number of different pattern
例外:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If n < 0 || n < r, throw it
関連項目:
Factorial.factorial(int)

repeatedPermutation

public static long repeatedPermutation(int n,
                                       int r)
calculate permutation (repeated) nΠr

パラメータ:
n - number of all elements
r - number of selected elements
戻り値:
number of pattern nΠr = n ^ r
例外:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If n < 0 or n < r, throw it

combination

public static long combination(int n,
                               int r)
calculate number of combination pattern nCr

パラメータ:
n - number of all elements
r - number of selected elements
戻り値:
number of combination pattern .. nCr = n! / (r! * (n - r)!)
例外:
IllegalargumentException - if n < 0 or n < r, throw it
関連項目:
Factorial.factorial(int)

repeatedCombination

public static long repeatedCombination(int n,
                                       int r)
caluculate number of repeated combination pattern nHr

パラメータ:
n - number of elements kind
r - number of selected elements
戻り値:
number of repeated combination pattern .. nHr = (n+r+1)Cr
例外:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if n < 0 or n < r, throw it
関連項目:
combination(int, int)
